title: Larian founder responds to debate over Baldur's Gate 3 'raising the bar' for RPGs: 'this is videogames, standards just die every day'
description: Baldur's Gate 3's success ignited an argument over whether it's a one-off anomaly or a new standard for the RPG genre.

title: Electronic Arts is closing the servers for even more old games, including Dead Space 2, Crysis 3, and Mirror's Edge Catalyst
description: You should be able to continue with the singleplayer campaigns, but multiplayer is going away for good.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 wizard accidentally breaks the game by learning too many spells
description: There is such a thing as too much magic.

title: Please help me understand these weird Baldur's Gate 3 gloves that make my animal summons randomly attack my friends
description: Baldur's Gate 3 has magic gloves called Abyss Beckoners, and I'm trying to figure out if they're actually useful or just cursed.

title: It's taken more than 30 years, but Flashback 2 finally has a release date

title: In the face of player backlash, Dark and Darker developers say they may stop selling character classes
description: New character classes can currently be purchased for $10 each, and an awful lot of fans aren't happy about it.
